{"id":1101016327,"question_id":2917,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1700252106,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1101016327/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Pairs Whose Sum is Less than Target","memory":"41.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countPairs(List<Integer> nums, int target) {\n        \n        Collections.sort(nums);\n\n        int count = 0; \n        int left=0;\n        int right=nums.size()-1;\n        \n        while (left < right){\n\n            if(nums.get(left) + nums.get(right) < target){\n                count += right - left;\n                left++;\n            } else {\n                right--;\n            }\n\n        }\n\n        return count; \n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-pairs-whose-sum-is-less-than-target","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
